text:
:wave:Hi everyone!
This is my first time asking a question, hope this is the right channel to ask. Otherwise, if you can point me to the right place it would be great. Thanks!

I’m in the process of creating a theme. As a reference I use default HubSpot code files trying to understand the best way of development.
I stumbled upon this piece of code responsible for an icon but, unfortunately, can’t find anything about it in HubSpot documentation. If anyone could guide me where to read in more detail about icon code snippet it’d be great!
```{% icon 
   name="chevron-down" 
   style="SOLID",
   width="16",
   purpose="semantic",
   title="Open the submenu",
   no_wrapper=True
 %}```
I can’t seem to find the icon tag in the documentation either. In the interim this page might be able to help: <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/cos-general/how-to-install-font-awesome>

Thank you <@UQERM7BLY>! Much appreciated.
Hope they add some info about it any time soon
